about_the_game:
Sword Islands is a PC-VR Project inspired by your favorite RPGs and Anime series. With a focus on sword-play and unique blade arts that can be performed to take down your enemies.
Go on a solo adventure or join your friend's party up to 4 players, and explore the mystical landscape of the islands.



you wield a weapon in your primary hand to strike enemies and a shield in your secondary hand to block attacks, minimizing damage to your health points.

Parrying Enemy Attacks


Your blade welding skills will be put to the test as you engage in combat. Use your quick reflexes and strategic thinking to deflect your opponent's strikes,
causing them to get staggered which helps to deal bonus damage.

The Blade Arts


Blade Arts are flashy signatures that can be equipped onto your armament. The interesting part is that you select which Blade Art to perform by adopting a specific pose.
which involves holding your sword in a particular position





Drawing inspiration from the souls-like genre, players will gather Data points to enhance their attributes. Upgrading these attributes will have tangible effects in the game boosting your character performance to face tougher enemies.





Expect a sleek and innovative interface that breaks away from the conventional and mundane VR pointers trope!





beside all the features mentioned there are tons of activities to take part in like fishing, cooking, climbing and gliding.
all designed with a focus to strengthen the core gameplay loop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: quad-core 3.0ghz minimum
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / 970 for Rift CV1+Touch, Original Vive at 90hz, and RiftS at 80hz
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 / 2060super or greater for Rift CV1+Touch, Original Vive 90hz, and RiftS 80hz
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Dive into the digital world and master your blade in a VR experience designed with action and exploration in mind. Go solo or join your party, with up to 4 players in a co-op campaign.
